meta.description: Determine the maximum amount of cargo that can be transported from Hub 0 (dispatch center) to Hub 5 (destination) per day without surpassing road weight limits.

sets.name: HUBS
sets.description: Set of cargo hubs in the transportation network.

params.name: weight_limit
params.description: Maximum cargo weight limit (in tons) for each road between hubs.

vars.name: flow
vars.description: Amount of cargo (in tons) transported from one hub to another.

objective.name: max_total_cargo
objective.description: Maximize the total cargo transported from Hub 0 to Hub 5.

constraints.name: weight_limit_0_1
constraints.description: Cargo flow from Hub 0 to Hub 1 must not exceed weight limit.

constraints.name: weight_limit_0_2
constraints.description: Cargo flow from Hub 0 to Hub 2 must not exceed weight limit.

constraints.description: Cargo flow from Hub 0 to Hub 3 must not exceed weight limit.

constraints.description: Cargo flow from Hub 0 to Hub 5 must not exceed weight limit.
